name: Hit 'em balls
description:
Only Russian language at this point.

Try to put the balls into the holes with minimum hits. Freeze time on some holes to change trajectory of your ball.
This game is made for Two Weeks Game 23 game jam.

Cursor will go out of the window if you play in window, which doesn't help. At this point please stick to the standalone version, full screne mode. I will fix it in the coming updates.

To-do:
· in-game full screne toggle
· resolve cursor issue
· english language
· camera control selection
· a few more levels

Possible ports:
· Nintendo New 3DS
· Playstation Vita
· Android

Please stay tuned for future updates and ports releases
